triplets: Fashion accessory worn around the collar, tied in a bow shape for formal or stylish attire
Fashion, formal occasions, business attire, weddings, parties, and events requiring dressy clothing
Silk, cotton, polyester, satin, or blends; may include elastic or adjustable bands
Bow knot forming the decorative front
Neckband or strap for securing around the collar
Varies widely; common colors include black, navy, red, and patterned designs
Formal wear, business attire, tuxedo outfits, and fashion accessories
Various manufacturers producing fashion accessories for men and women
Approximately 20–50 grams depending on material and style
Typically 2–5 cm depending on style and bow size
Typically 2–10 years depending on material quality, frequency of use, and care
